task_description: Generate a 3D cartoon-style icon of a cute Q-version rice noodle bowl, featuring overflowing noodles with garnishes, rendered in high-quality commercial-grade 3D style

input_data.text_prompt: A 3D rendered icon of an adorable Q-version rice noodle bowl, 3/4 top-down perspective. White ceramic bowl with smooth rounded shape (#F5F5DC), glossy white rice noodles (#FFFAF0) naturally curling and overflowing from the bowl. Golden-brown broth visible inside (#D4A574) with water shine effect. Garnished with bright green cilantro (#90EE90) and vibrant red chili peppers (#FF6347). High-gloss ceramic texture on bowl, steaming hot effect with subtle vapor wisps. Soft shadows beneath, dual light source from top and 45-degree front. Pure white or transparent background. Ultra-detailed textures, commercial food photography quality, Pixar-style 3D rendering, octane render, 8K resolution, professional studio lighting, hyper-realistic material shaders. Reference style: cute 3D food icon design with cartoon aesthetics, playful and appetizing presentation
input_data.negative_prompt: flat design, 2D illustration, low quality, blurry, pixelated, dark background, unrealistic proportions, ugly, distorted, poorly rendered, low poly, amateur lighting, grainy, watermark, text

metadata.notes: 3D cartoon rice noodle bowl icon with Q-version cute style, commercial quality rendering
